name: Zone of the Slug
description:
Save the Empire!

The Empire will soon fall, our hero's only hope is to defeat Lord Slug!

Zone of the Slug is a First Person RPG set in the world ruled by the Evil Lord Slug. 

Attain the power of the Magic Sword and defeat the Lord Slug Empire.



Role Playing

The Empire of Lord Slug is mighty, only you the "Hero" can reach the levels needed to defeat them!  

Explore

The Empire is vast, explore it in order to obtain the strongest armors and sword throughout the land. 

Combat Action

Move and hit, calculate the right time to strike down a foe!

And more!
